PCAAD 2.1 Personal Computer Aided Antenna Design
File Name: pcaad21.zip
Category: Antennas
Company: Antenna Design Associates, Inc.
File Size: 161KB
Platform: dos

Abstract: PCAAD 2.1 is a DOS software package for the analysis and design of antennas, including wire antennas, horn antennas, arrays, and microstrip antennas. Uploaded by the author, Dave Pozar.
